name: Azure AD - Create a new user
description: Creates a new user in Azure AD. Upon successful creation, a new user will be created. Adversaries create new users so that their malicious activity does not interrupt the normal functions of the compromised users and can remain undetected for a long time.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/2
steps.description: Check if AzureAD PowerShell module is installed

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/2
steps.description: Check if AzureAD PowerShell module is installed

data.command: echo "use the following to install AzureAD PowerShell module - Install-Module -Name AzureAD -Scope CurrentUser -Repository PSGallery -Force"

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/2
steps.description: Check if AzureAD PowerShell module is installed

steps.name: Check dependency 2/2
steps.description: Check if AzureAD PowerShell module is installed

data.command: Update the input arguments so the userprincipalname value is accurate for your environment

steps.name: Resolve dependency 2/2
steps.description: Check if AzureAD PowerShell module is installed

data.command: echo "Update the input arguments in the .yaml file so that the userprincipalname value is accurate for your environment"

steps.name: Re-check dependency 2/2
steps.description: Check if AzureAD PowerShell module is installed

data.command: Update the input arguments so the userprincipalname value is accurate for your environment

input_arguments.name: password
input_arguments.description: Password for the new Azure AD user being created

input_arguments.name: username
input_arguments.description: Display name of the new user to be created in Azure AD

input_arguments.name: userprincipalname
input_arguments.description: User principal name (UPN) for the new Azure user being created format email address
